Name: Waba
About the game: Waba is an interactive video game character, empathic petting simulator, and virtual wobble pet. Waba wobbles when you touch him, and heâ€™ll also wobble your heartstrings. Waba was developed for controller-based VR with the goal of creating a special form of interactivity and presence that can only exist within the medium of virtual reality. You can pet Waba, stretch Waba, feed Waba, put waba to sleep, and play fetch together! Join the Waba discord to speak direclty with the devs! We love hearing your thoughts, dreams, ideas, and feedback about Waba!
